tool.name: SAR Finder
tool.description: constructs a putative list of potential u-spanin from an input genomic FASTA

param.label: Range Selection; default is all; slices are based on NT. Separated by a colon (eg. #:#)
param.name: switch

param.label: TMD minimal distance from start codon
param.name: tmd_min_start

param.label: TMD maximum distance from start codon
param.name: tmd_max_start

param.label: Lipobox minimal distance from start codon
param.name: lipo_min_start

param.label: Lipobox maximum distance from start codon
param.name: lipo_max_start

param.label: Minimum amount of periplasmic residues after Lipobox
param.name: min_lipo_after

param.label: Maximum amount of periplasmic residues after Lipobox
param.name: max_lipo_after

tool.help:
ALPHA VERSION OF USP TOOL *WARNING* - Use a single genome fasta. Multiple FASTAs will not work. Generates a putative multifasta and multigff3 of the unimolecular spanin (u-spanin) class. Uses methods from the ISP and OSP candidates tool for finding TMDs and the Lipobox.
INPUT: Genomic FASTA
OUTPUT: Summary of results as well as multi FA and GFF3 of candidates that matched criteria.
